tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ArtEventOrganizers (
  organizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organizer_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_name VARCHAR(100),
  event_date DATE,
  registration_link VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtEventOrganizers (
  organizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organizer_name TEXT,
  organizer_contact TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Registration (
  registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  attendee_name TEXT,
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Logistics (
  logistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  logistic_type TEXT,
  logistic_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  organizer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (organizer_id) REFERENCES organizers(organizer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE registrations (
  registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  registration_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logistics (
  logistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  logistic_description TEXT,
  logistic_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  organizer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (organizer_id) REFERENCES organizers(organizer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE registrations (
  registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attendee_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  registration_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  registration_id INT,
  ticket_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (registration_id) REFERENCES registrations(registration_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logistics (
  logistics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  logistics_description TEXT,
  logistics_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);
